ConfigClient.title: Config Client
ConfigClient.description: Client that connects to a Spring Cloud Config Server to fetch the application's configuration.

ConfigServer.title: Config Server
ConfigServer.description: Central management for configuration via Git, SVN, or HashiCorp Vault.

VaultConfiguration.title: Vault Configuration
VaultConfiguration.description: Provides client-side support for externalized configuration in a distributed system. Using HashiCorp's Vault you have a central place to manage external secret properties for applications across all environments.

ApacheZookeeperConfiguration.title: Apache Zookeeper Configuration
ApacheZookeeperConfiguration.description: Enable and configure common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Apache Zookeeper based components. The provided patterns include Configuration.

ConsulConfiguration.title: Consul Configuration
ConsulConfiguration.description: Enable and configure the common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Hashicorpâ€™s Consul. The patterns provided include Service Discovery, Distributed Configuration and Control Bus.
